title: akaros
author: akaros
content: Hi guys, I have some S17+ 70TH in very good conditions (30pcs selected from 100pcs) for sale.Possible to transport in SLOVAKIA a CZECHIA to your doors. You can check and test before buy. I can sell very cheap, price depends on how much pieces you want to buy. Please feel free to ask by email samo@ctr.sk

comments.author: tutorialevideo
comments.body: Quote from: lowbander801 on October 07, 2022, 06:23:44 AMalways put price Price and if you accept escrow!TY
